unittitle_ssm: Petition to the Postmaster General of Northport
abstract_ssm: An 1873 two-page petition to the Postmaster General of Northport, Long Island that requests that the town post office be moved to a more convenient location. The petition also calls for the removal of the postmaster of Northport for incompetence.
subject_ssm: Postmasters general -- New York (State) -- Long Island
